question: Weight
a: Usually thin, often difficult to put on weight, visible ribs, weight can vary
c: Larger, difficult to lose weight, heavy bones

question: Skin
b: Oily, smooth, warm, freckles & moles, rosy or copper. sunburns easily

question: Hair
b: Reddish tinge, oily, early receding or balding, graying medium thickness

question: Eyes
a: Smaller, scanty lashes, white part looks, a bit gray, nervous, blinking
b: Piercing, intense, light sensitive, white part often reddish or yellow
c: Larger, calm, thick lashes, beautiful, white part clear & white

question: Teeth & Gums
a: Too many or not enough teeth, irregular, gaps, overcrowded, receding gums
b: Moderate size, teeth can yellow, gums bleed easily

question: Circulation
a: Variable to poor (eg: cold hands & feet)

question: Stool
a: Irregular; not always daily, constipated, hard, little pieces, gas
b: Regular; daily + soft, loose, burns, can be yellowish or greenish
c: Large well formed, oily, regular, but not too frequent

question: Nose
b: Longer, pointed, tip may be red, sharp

question: Emotions
c: Calm, can be over-attached & posseive, slow to anger

question: Temperament
a: Variable, changeable, excitable, creative, sociable, makes friends easily
b: Motivated, competitive, driven, impatient, controlling, likes to interact for a purpose
c: Happy & easy going, can be lazy reserved

question: Speech
a: Fast, frequent, higher-pitched, can go on tangents
b: Good orators, articulate, can be sharp, argumentative, medium tone

question: Mind
a: Very quick, adaptable, curious, restless, can lose interest quickly

question: Memory
a: Quick but, absent-minded, learns & forgets easily
c: Slower to grasp initial idea but once remembers does not forget easily
